availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morganfield, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to L. B. Cissell. Father of John V. Cissell. Married to Jenna D. Cissell on June 24, 1855. Attorney in Morganfield in 1850 and 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Morganfield in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District No., p. 457B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 209. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 34. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Union County Marriages, p. 1.
